actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the purchase, sale, and exchange of lands by the Lummi Indian Tribe of the Lummi Indian Reservation, Washington, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to purchase, sell, and exchange lands held by the Lummi Indian Tribe of the Lummi Indian Reservation, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the purchase, sale, and exchange of lands by the Lummi Indian Tribe of the Lummi Indian Reservation, Washington, and for other purposes.
